Examples of charts in use
Barriers to e-learning

This file contains a survey sheet and two types of display for the results. It also has some spare sheets you can use with ready-made charts linked to them. Either use them to collect similar data (always welcome!) or change the questions and titles to suit some completely different purpose,

Misleading charts

Examples of the actual charts – so you can take them to pieces or play with them – used for illustrations in this report
Plus: a re-working of the 'auctions' data to show just how silly the published one was

Charts in quizzes and other bits

The data for some other illustrations used in this report with a couple of fun items which you can do what you like with.

More examples will be added in future: contact Andrew Hill at design@ahi2000.com for any updates or to contribute more.
